request.description:
This method allows you to get all Publisher Objects.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/marketplace/publisher?00000
(where 00000 is client Id)

This method allows you to get publisher by integration Id.

EXAMPLE: v1/od/buyer/marketplace/publisher/111111?00000
(where 111111 is integrationId and 00000 is client Id)

This method allows you to get all products belonging to given publisher that match criteria given in query.

EXAMPLE: v1/od/buyer/marketplace/publisher/11111/products?000000
(where 111111 is integrationId and 00000 is client Id)

This method allows you to get a specific product with given 'productId' if it belongs to publisher with 'integrationId'.

EXAMPLE: v1/od/buyer/marketplace/publisher/111111/products/22222?00000
(where 22222 is productId, 11111 is integrationId and 00000 is client Id)
This method allows to get pricing and availability information.
This method allows to get Client Organizations of Current organization.
This method allows to create new Agency (Top Level) Organization object

This method allows to update new Agency (Top Level) Organization object.

You need to parse Organization Id on your request Url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/od/buyer/organizations/00000
(where 00000 is organizationId)
This method allows to get Current Top Level Organization.
Create new Client Organization object.

Create new Client Organization object.

EXAMPLE: /v1/od/buyer/organizations/clients/00000
(where 00000 is organization Id)
This method allows to get All Accounts for current organization.
This method allows to create Account object.

This method allows to get specific account by account Id.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000
(where 00000 is account Id)

This method allows to get all orders under a specific account.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders
(where 00000 is account Id)

This method allows to create a new order under a specific account.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders
(where 00000 is account Id)

This method allows to delete an order.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111
(where 00000 is account Id and 11111 is order Id)

This method allows to get a specific order by order Id.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111
(where 00000 is account Id and 11111 is order Id)

This method allows to update an existing order.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111
(where 00000 is account Id and 11111 is order Id)

This method allows to get all lines in order for account.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111/lines
(where 00000 is account Id and 11111 is order Id)

This method allows to create new lines in order.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111/lines
(where 00000 is account Id and 11111 is order Id)

This method allows to delete lines in order.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111/lines/22222
(where 00000 is account Id, 11111 is order Id, 22222 is line Id)

This method allows to get specifi lines.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111/lines/22222
(where 00000 is account Id, 11111 is order Id, 22222 is line Id)

This method allows to update specific lines in order.

EXAMPLE: /v1/od/buyer/accounts/00000/orders/11111/lines/22222?x
(where 00000 is account Id, 11111 is order Id, 22222 is line Id and x is status)

Possible status values:
1. book
2. reserve
3. cancel
4. reset

This method allows to get all assignmentsfor account.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/00000/accounts/11111/assignments
(where 00000 is integration Id and 11111 is account Id)

This method allows to create a new assignment.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/00000/accounts/11111/assignments
(where 00000 is integration Id and 11111 is account Id)

This method allows to delete an assignment.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/00000/accounts/11111/assignments/22222
(where 00000 is integration Id, 11111 is account Id, 22222 is assignment Id)

This method allows to get a specific assignment.

EXAMPLE: /od/buyer/00000/accounts/11111/assignments/22222
(where 00000 is integration Id, 11111 is account Id, 22222 is assignment Id)
Gets all Products that match criteria given in query.
Gets the Product with given 'productId' if it belongs to publisher

item.name: Get placements of product by productId

request.description: Gets the placements of Product with given 'productId' if it belongs to publisher

item.name: Get pricing and avails time series (products)
Get pricing and avails time series (placements)

Get All Accounts for current organization
Get all lines in order for account
Get One Line by Account for Order

request.description:
status can be equal to: 
	book
	reserve
	cancel
	reset

item.name: Get all change requests for account

request.description: Only one change request with Pending status is supported
Change request can be deleted only if it has Pending status
Change request can be updated only if it has Pending status
Gets available keys with availble values for key-value targeting
